General.Name: Orefinders Resources Inc
General.Description: Orecap Invest Corp. invests in the natural resource sector. It seeks opportunities in precious and critical metal assets and businesses. The company was formerly known as Orefinders Resources Inc. and changed its name to Orecap Invest Corp. in May 2023. Orecap Invest Corp. was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 55 University Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2H7
